keyMoments.title: Block C Battle Royale Intensifies
keyMoments.description: The Block C competition continues with multiple powerful fighters including Lucy, Jean Ango, Kelly Funk, Sai, Ideo, and Don Chinjao battling for dominance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the high level of competition in the Corrida Colosseum tournament.

keyMoments.title: Luffy and Chinjao's Epic Haki Clash
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Chinjao clash with powerful Armament Haki, creating a shockwave that knocks away all remaining competitors and spectators.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most spectacular displays of Haki power in the Colosseum, demonstrating the intensity of Block C competition.

description: A massive arena in Dressrosa hosting a tournament where the prize is the Mera Mera no Mi Devil Fruit. The Colosseum features multiple blocks of competition, with Block C being featured in this episode.
historicalSignificance: The Corrida Colosseum is a famous battle arena in Dressrosa that attracts powerful fighters from across the New World to compete.
notableFeatures: Large fighting arena with spectator stands
Multiple blocks (A, B, C, D) for preliminary rounds

connectedLocations.description: The Corrida Colosseum is located on the island of Dressrosa

reveals.information: Block C competition narrows down to final competitors with spectacular displays of Devil Fruit powers and Haki

statusHistory.description: Hosting the Mera Mera no Mi tournament

keyMoments.title: Giolla Confronts Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Nami, Brook, and Chopper continue dealing with Giolla and the Donquixote Pirates while attempting to protect Momonosuke and retake their ship.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the parallel storyline of the Straw Hats defending their ship while Luffy is at the tournament.

keyMoments.title: Submarine Sabotage
keyMoments.description: Brook and Chopper appear on the Donquixote Pirates' submarine while Nami's team destroys it.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' tactical coordination in defending their ship.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, currently anchored near Dressrosa while under attack by Giolla and the Donquixote Pirates.
historicalSignificance: The Thousand Sunny is the second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates, built by Franky using treasure tree Adam wood.

statusHistory.description: Being attacked by Giolla and the Donquixote Pirates
